title: Order a Critical Spare Part
description: A critical, long-lead-time spare part (e.g., a large motor) has been used from inventory. A planner must order a replacement to maintain readiness.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the system alert that the inventory for the critical spare has dropped to zero.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the specific part that needs to be reordered.

tasks.description: Retrieve the approved vendor and pricing for this specific part.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the designated supplier and contract price.

tasks.description: Create and issue a purchase order to the vendor for one unit of the motor.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates and sends the purchase order.
